to spread (ideas, customs, etc.) from one person or place to another; to propagate.
the lower edge of a roof, usu. projecting beyond the sides of a building; the eves.
a small cutting tool, as a knife, dagger,etc.
the sound produced from a person or bird.
kind of musical instrument.
a stone slab placed between the slant-roof of a building and the wall below it.
to make a formal or ritual declaration, in the name of a god or a revered person that one would do or refrain from doing something; to take an oath, vow.
to cause to take an oath.
